properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 13 at 2:06AM CST until February 13 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Tennessee...

Piney River Near Vernon affecting Hickman County

. Heavy rainfall has caused the Piney River near Vernon to rise above
its Action Stage. The river is expected to crest and fall throughout the
morning hours.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Piney River Near Vernon
* At 01AM Thursday the stage was 10.6 feet.
* Action stage is 10.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* At 10.0 feet...Water begins to overflow the natural banks and inundates low
lying areas along the river from Interstate 40 to near Pinewood, Nunnelly, and
down to the Duck River.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
